name: LinkShortner_Bot
description: Make short link by using any of GPlink, exe.io, afly.in an other API key

SHORTNER_URL.description: Get this value from shortner website's /member/tools/developer-api but remember to put like https://yourdomain.com/api?api={}&url={}&format=json

SHORTNER_API.description: Get this value from shortner website's /member/tools/developer-api

WELCOME_TEXT.description: Add your beloving text what you want to add in /start command
WELCOME_TEXT.value:
Hi, I'm a Link Shortner bot currently using shortner API !
You can short link using me.
Just sent me your long URL

HELP_TEXT.description: Add text what you wanna show in /help text
HELP_TEXT.value:
Sent me any link!


Enample:
https://google.com
https://bing.com

MAINTAINER.description: Add your @username and it will be shown in bot
